comment.body:
> [yahoo](#comment_1_1J9VNMmd8qb49rd1P1xrwyNYU6j2DstqZS): Does it actually display the comments?

Yes.
Mine has stood at rev 360, is that normal?

> [nofish](#comment_24_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Update: Now you can make the Update button appear manually by clicking on text "Version" in ZeroHello's topright corner.

Ah, excellent.
